auth.title: - Register / Login -
auth.step1: Visitors can select 'Login' or 'Register' from the user dropdown menu in the navigation bar.
auth.step2: Enter email, nickname, and repeat the password to register. After registration, you will be redirected to the home page.
auth.step3: If you have already registered, you can log in directly with your email and password. After logging in, you will be redirected to the home page.

home.title: Home Page Browsing
home.desc1: Popular activity locations will recommend the top six city areas based on the number of activities.
home.desc2: The activity list will show all activities. You can use the filters in the top left to sort by method, difficulty, time, and location.
home.desc3: The display mode in the top right offers both card and list views.
home.desc4: Currently, only 'Hiking' is available. Other activity options are not yet implemented.

search.title: Search Function
search.desc1: You can enter the search page through the search bar in the navigation bar or the 'Activity List'.
search.desc2: The search page allows keyword searches and filtering by sort order, difficulty, time, and location.
search.desc3: The right side of the search page lists the five most recently viewed activities.

activity.title: Browsing Activity Information
activity.desc1: The top half of the activity information page shows important details, including time, location, introduction, difficulty, duration, estimated cost, and participant limits.
activity.desc2: The 'Activity Participants' section on the right shows the current host and participants.
activity.desc3: If logged in, you can use the favorite and join features. Joined activities can be viewed on your user profile page.
activity.desc4: The bottom half of the activity information page provides details on outdoor specifics, transportation, accommodation, and itinerary.
activity.desc5: The end of the activity page also features a browsing history section for users to see their five most recent activities.

user.title: Browsing User Information
user.desc1: The user page displays basic information for a specific user, including email, region, age, occupation, and bio.
user.desc2: Below that, you can view lists of activities the user has participated in, favorited, or hosted.
user.desc3: The 'Popular Hosts' section on the right recommends the top 10 users who have hosted the most activities.

create.title: Creating an Activity (Login Required)
create.desc1: After logging in, click the '+' symbol next to the user icon in the top right of the navigation bar to open the activity creation window.
create.desc2: Currently, all fields are required. If any are left blank, a warning will appear and prevent you from proceeding.
create.desc3: To prevent accidental closing, data is preserved when the window is closed. You can clear it using 'Clear Data' in the top right of the window.
create.desc4: Once all five steps are completed, you will be automatically redirected to the newly created activity page.

update.title: Updating Activities and Removing Participants (Login Required)
update.desc1: On an activity page you hosted, use the 'Update Activity' button below the introduction to open the update window.
update.desc2: The usage is similar to the creation window. You can also use 'Restore Changes' in the top right to revert information.
update.desc3: To delete an activity, use 'Delete Activity' in the top right. A confirmation popup will appear.
update.desc4: As a host, you will see a remove button on participant cards to remove other users.

editUser.title: Updating Public User Info (Login Required)
editUser.desc1: On your own user page, click 'Update Info' to enter the 'Edit User Profile' window.
editUser.desc2: You can update your public cover photo, avatar, name, birthday, occupation, region, and bio.
editUser.desc3: If you don't want to update, use 'Cancel Update' in the bottom right to discard changes and close the window.

account.title: Updating Account Info (Login Required)
account.desc1: Select 'Account Settings' from the user dropdown in the navigation bar to enter the 'Edit Account Info' window.
account.desc2: Here you can reset your username, email, and password. Since this involves sensitive info, you'll need to enter your current password to update.

logout.title: Logout (Login Required)
logout.desc1: Select 'Logout' from the user dropdown in the navigation bar to log out and reset the current view.
